challenges_encountered.challenge: Ghost editor format mismatch - Lexical vs Mobiledoc
challenges_encountered.impact: Phase 3.0.3 pilot test failed - About page NOT updated despite API returning success. Content still shows old version from Jan 27.
challenges_encountered.solution: Discovered existing Ghost pages use Lexical format (newer editor), but workflow created Mobiledoc format (older). Ghost API silently accepted mobiledoc update but didn't apply it. Reported to team via NATS. Awaiting decision on workflow direction.
challenges_encountered.lessons_learned: CRITICAL: Must check Ghost editor format BEFORE creating content. Ghost API can return HTTP 200 success but not actually update content if format mismatch. Lexical is Ghost's current/future direction. Workflow needs to support Lexical format, not just Mobiledoc.
challenges_encountered.preventive_measures: Query Ghost page format via API before content creation. Update Doc Brown agent to support Lexical format. Add format validation step to workflow.
